column5: congratulations man, thats awesome.  I'm only 20 so I'm hoping my little fishing buddy wont be on its way for a few more years yet, but I already wanna take him fishing haha.
Congrats Kirk and family! HH

Congrats!!! My two little future fishing buddies (2years and 9 1/2months old girls) are getting trained already. Daddy watches fishing shows on Saturday mornings with his two fave little'uns.  Cheers and good luck!!!

Congrats!!! My two little future fishing buddies (2years and 9 1/2months old girls) are getting trained already. Daddy watches fishing shows on Saturday mornings with his two fave little'uns.  Cheers and good luck!!!
Anna enjoyed reading the replies.  Thanks from us to everyone
Congrats Kirk.
This August will hopefully mark the delivery of our second baby boy or girl.
Awesome news!!! Be sure you find a decent lawyer to ensure 51% ownership of said child.   Congrats to you and the misses!  Gerritt.
This isn't gonna mess up our June musky trip is it ??  j/k Kirk, we'll work around it  Congrats to you and the Mrs, having kids is the best thing you can do
Congrats Kirk, that's great news.  At least we know why you couldn't catch any fish last November ...too busy  Joey

Not to worry Gerrit, don't need a lawyer to get shares if you sleep with president of the company.  I can still fish Lew, I think June is safe since the due date is August 23.  A+ in math Joey? November was a good month
Congratulations, Kirk, to you and your growing family.  I agree with Lew, new people is the best thing in the world.  Good luck to Mrs. Kirk too.
congrats on the new baby thats on the way....
Congrats to you and the Miss's. Great News!  Cheers, 1leg
Great News Kirk!!  Congrats...
Keep up the good work Kirk and congrats!  Before you know it you will have caught up to Marty...

Thanks guys.  I'll pass on the regards to Mrs. Kirk aka Anna. LOL  Won't catch up with Marty...I get the evil glare when I just mention #3.  (Same glare I got when I told the nurses "see you in 9 months" when we were leaving the hospital with our first.)
Congrats Kirk and wish the missus a healthy pregnancy.

I remember the glare too Kirk. Now that we do have the third, she just threatens divorce if I mention the possibility of #4.  I'm happy my wife still lets me work in the garden, but she says I already have too many vegetables and won't let me plant any more seeds.   Congradulations Kirk and Anna.
Congrats Kirk and Anna !!!  Maureen
....At your age Kirk? Wow, way to go!  Congratulations to you and Anna.  I'm thinking the new arrival will be wanting a custom rod....
If he doesn't figure out what's causing this pretty quick....Kirk may have a custom rod of his own....
CONGRATES ON THE BABY WE ARE EXPECTING OUR SECOND ASWELL IN MAY.GOOD LUCK TO YOU AND YOURS.   JER
Congrats to you and the family Kirk!
Way to go Kirk and Anna. See, all it took was practice Kirk!

Hey Carp, a nice dinner with a good red wine, then back home, light the fireplace then open a 2nd bottle of red and Voila! Works every time.  My motto is that a house is not a home without a baby. Congartulations Kirk.
Congrats Kirk
Congrats Kirk.  Great news.
Hey Kirk, sincere congrats.
Awesome!  Best wishes for a great pregnancy and a healthy baby!!  Congratulations!   Bly
